content: ""http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/worldnews/article-1158779/Thousands-Mexican-soldiers-pour-countrys-violent-city-crackdown-drug-gangs.html"" I think this is a good start in the right direction. I do not think they will be able to afford to sustain the deployment so I am assuming Mexico's president will be asking for funding assistance. Will we be able to afford it if it comes to that?

title: Crackdown in Mexico
